title: Day 24: Too tired to write much
body:
... but that's okay, not much happened today. Same old same old: paint, build, paint. We're ramping up for Friday's meet and greet during First Friday. Hope to see lots of you there!

I'll make sure tomorrow's post is better. I promise.
author: Dan

comments.author: Aaron Scott
comments.body: Hmph! You also met with your Cinebar sponsor and designer (also designer for the Cinebar sponsor)! I feel so valued now. Thanks a lot, jerk.

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: Don't worry, Aaron. I have to beg him to put in stuff that I worked on.

comments.author: nicki
comments.body: i'm so frickin' excited about first friday!!!!!!
